     * @param _value the amount of money to burn
nodes.name: burn

params._value: the max amount they can spend

params._extraData: some extra information to send to the approved contract
params._value: the max amount they can spend
the amount of money to burn
the amount of money to burn

approve(address,uint256).notice: Approves `_spender` to send up to `_value` tokens on your behalf

approveAndCall(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Allows `_spender` to spend no more than `_value` tokens on your behalf, and then ping the contract about it

burn(uint256).notice: Remove `_value` tokens from the system irreversibly

burnFrom(address,uint256).notice: Remove `_value` tokens from the system irreversibly on behalf of `_from`.

transfer(address,uint256).notice: Send `_value` tokens from your account to `_to`

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Send `_value` tokens to `_to` on behalf of `_from`
